tumourExtent.description: Determine if the report specifies the tumour extent.
enumDescriptions: Assign 'LOC': if the tumour extent was specified as Localised.
Assign 'MIF': if the tumour extent was specified as Multifocal (or Multiple foci, Multi invasive foci, etc.).
Assign 'UNI': if the tumour extent was specified as Unifocal.
Assign null: if the tumour extent was not explicitly specified in the report.
